name: Sally's Salon
storyline: Help Sally spread her salon savvy from her hometown shopping mall to the glittering lights of Hollywood in this colorful and engaging challenge. Wash, dye, cut, style and more in 50 levels of frantic, but fashionable, fun. Use your earnings to hire helpful employees and purchase salon upgrades to keep your clients looking and feeling their best. Only the stylist with the happiest and best-looking customers will make the cut in this frenzy of family fun.
summary: Sally's Salon asks players to help Sally fulfill her dream of opening the most fabulous hair and beauty salon in the world.
